idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release: - Basic tag management functionality - Colorful tag display - Context menu integration
idea-plugin.name: File Tagger
idea-plugin.description:
File Tagger plugin for GoLand.
Features: - Add, edit, and remove tags for files and directories - Tags are displayed in different colors in the project view - Supports both light and dark themes - Easy tag management through context menu

action.description: Edit tags for selected file or directory
